channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Office Online Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Office Online Server

item.title: CVE-2020-0695|2024-08-04T06:11:05.031Z -- microsoft -- office%20online%20server
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists when Office Online Server does not validate origin in cross-origin communications correctly, aka 'Microsoft Office Online Server Spoofing Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2021-43256|2024-08-04T03:55:28.380Z -- microsoft -- office%20online%20server
item.description: Microsoft Excel Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists when Office Online does not validate origin in cross-origin communications correctly, aka 'Microsoft Office Online Spoofing Vulnerability'.
